forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 18C. ESE winds shifting to SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 65F. ESE winds shifting to SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
